message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 9000, you take 1000.  If you accept, we're done. If not, you get to make the next offer.
Your offer was a bit harsh, Alice. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Let's be reasonable.  I'll take 5500, and you can have 4500.  It's closer to a fair split than your previous offer.  Accept and we're done.
